tool_description: Our Article API provides comprehensive article data with javascript rendering, quick response time, and competitive pricing.
name: Article Text Extraction and Data Mining
title: Article Text Extraction and Data Mining
tool_name: Article Text Extraction and Data Mining

api_list.name: Extract Article Data
api_list.description: The /extract_article_data endpoint is a GET request that allows users to scrape data from an article based on the provided URL. The endpoint takes in three parameters: url, js, and js_timeout. The url parameter is required and should contain the URL of the article that data is being requested from. The js parameter is optional and defaults to False, it specifies whether or not to execute javascript on the article's website. The js_timeout parameter is optional and defaults to 20 seconds, it specifies the time in seconds to wait for javascript execution. Upon a successful request, the endpoint returns a JSON object containing the data scraped from the article, this includes text, html, media, images, author, pub_date, url, canonical_url, title, language, image, summary, modified_date, site_name, favicon, encoding and keywords. In case of any error, the endpoint returns an error message with appropriate HTTP status code.
